title: Workshop on Building a Digital Repository for Summer Internship Project Reports

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Document Management Experience and Smartphone Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Learners study methods to build digital repositories using open-source tools in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Focus is on improving scientific report management processes based on practical field experience.

learning_goals: Using open-source software (Greenstone), learners can systematically collect summer internship project reports.
Learners can apply methods to enhance report search efficiency according to metadata input standards.
Learners acquire practical skills to operate and maintain a digital repository using only smartphones in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
